title: Gisele Bündchen shares picture of "Brady's Ladies" at Super Bowl
text:
Updated at 7:40 p.m. ET 
Updated at 7:40 p.m. ET 
Tom Brady has plenty of support on Super Bowl Sunday, especiallyÂ from the ladies in his life.Â 
Brady's wife, Gisele BĂźndchen, shared a photo of Brady's female relatives wearing custom "Brady's Ladies" jerseys in Houston. Â A photo posted by Gisele BĂźndchen (@gisele) on Feb 5, 2017 at 12:00pm PST 
Brady's sisters; his mother, GalynnÂ Brady;Â and his daughter Vivian are among the women pictured. 
Vivian got a special "Brady's little ladies" jersey. Â A photo posted by Gisele BĂźndchen (@gisele) on Feb 5, 2017 at 6:03am PST Watch This
